The immovable property as per the full details as per the schedule below is the property of my father,
which was distributed by my father and his brothers together in the form of a farmer before the year 1983,
and the income from my father's share was distributed by me, my father and my brothers together, and the income from my share was distributed in my name All the properties registered in the accounts of Sri Polishettipadu Gram Panchayat, up to this date, I have had the peaceful and unbroken possession and full ownership rights and I have been the sole owner of all the properties and I have not made any mortgage or other security to anyone else, and I am convinced that there are no liens, land notes or valid court seizures, joint share disputes, minor, guardianship or inheritance disputes, which bind this settlement property. You are my wife, and out of the natural affection I have for you, and with the intention of passing on to you some property as a token of my love and affection, I hereby transfer to you, free of charge, the immovable property valued at Rs. 10,13,000/-, as set out in the schedule below, and all rights I may have in the said immovable property, and I hereby give you possession of it this very day. Therefore, from this amount, you shall take possession of the settlement property as per the schedule and pay all the house taxes, etc. payable to the Sri Polishettipadu Gram Panchayat from this amount, and you, your son, grandson, and descendants, shall enjoy all the rights of donation, donation, exchange, sale, and all the other things, water, money, treasure, deposits, and stones, as you wish. When you enjoy the settlement property with all rights as per the schedule, you will be able to enjoy this settlement property without any claim or claim whatsoever arising in the future due to any encumbrances or any other person, at my own expense and responsibility, and I will be able to carry out this settlement without any claim or claim whatsoever against me, my heirs, my assigns, etc., or you, your heirs, your assigns, etc., for ever. Notices of this settlement property are hereby filed. The property has not been assigned by the Government under 2/77. And it is hereby confirmed that this is not land acquired for public use by the Government. Horn. Chinnakrishna

According to them, we have examined the schedule property in this document and the undersigned has prepared this document in the manner requested by me/us and us. I hereby declare that neither I nor my/our heirs have transferred the property in this deed to anyone. If the above information is found to be false, the clerk who prepared this deed, the Registration Department, the staff of the Registration Office shall not be held liable and I/we shall be held liable for all legal actions taken against me/us in that regard.
Kommu. Chinna Krishna.

If any of the matters stated herein are found to be untrue, the undersigned, the registration department and the staff of the registration office shall not be held responsible for any such matter and I/we shall be liable for all legal action taken against me/us in that regard.
K. Meramma

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: POLISETTIPADU/0(0-0) W-B: 0-0 SURVEY: 119/6 HOUSE: 2-63 EXTENT: 196.3S Q.Yds BUILT: 500SQ. FT Boundires: [N]: c.c r oad [S] house of kommu krishna [E]: c.c roa d [W]: house of kommu krishna (mestri)

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 386 of 2026, dated 27/Jan/2026, executed by Kommu Chinna Krishna in favour of His Wife, Kommu Meramma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 193.6 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 2-63, Assessment number 163, comprised in survey number 119/6, situated in Polisettipadu Revenue Village and Grama Panchayath, A. Konduru Mandal, within the District of NTR, registered at sub-registrar office Tiruvuru (622) is bounded as follows: North by: C.C. Road South by: House of Kommu Krishna East by: C.C. Road West by: House of Kommu Krishna (Mestri).
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: 1. It is to be noted that there is mismatch with the Extent between schedule (193.6 Sq. Yds) and Rule-3 Statement (196.3 Sq. Yds) of the deed, it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to obtain updated EC as per Deed. 2. It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
